Sqls.Sql: SELECT A.Id, A.Name, A.GroupId, G.Name GroupName, G.Description GroupDescription, A.ServiceId, S.Name ServiceName, S.Description ServiceDescription FROM AccountInfo A LEFT OUTER JOIN ServiceInfo S ON S.Id = A.ServiceId LEFT OUTER JOIN GroupInfo G ON G.Id = A.GroupId WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY A.Id

SELECT A.Id, A.Name, A.GroupId, G.Name GroupName, G.Description GroupDescription, A.ServiceId, S.Name ServiceName, S.Description ServiceDescription FROM AccountInfo A LEFT OUTER JOIN ServiceInfo S ON S.Id = A.ServiceId LEFT OUTER JOIN GroupInfo G ON G.Id = A.GroupId WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY A.Id

SELECT A.Id, A.Name, A.GroupId, G.Name GroupName, G.Description GroupDescription, A.ServiceId, S.Name ServiceName, S.Description ServiceDescription FROM AccountInfo A LEFT OUTER JOIN ServiceInfo S ON S.Id = A.ServiceId LEFT OUTER JOIN GroupInfo G ON G.Id = A.GroupId WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY A.Id

SELECT A.Id, A.Name, A.GroupId, G.Name GroupName, G.Description GroupDescription, A.ServiceId, S.Name ServiceName, S.Description ServiceDescription FROM AccountInfo A LEFT OUTER JOIN ServiceInfo S ON S.Id = A.ServiceId LEFT OUTER JOIN GroupInfo G ON G.Id = A.GroupId WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY A.Id
